column5: Hi, Just tried to add a little vid file to my post and it linked right to my e-mail (yikes!!!). Can anyone please tell me how to add a file that is a vid file from e-mail to my post. Thanks, Ryan

Ryan, right click on the video link, go to properties, then copy all of the url.  Then come to this site and click the hyperlink instead of the picture (the square between the happy face and the picture above) and paste it in that link.  Hope that makes sense.  Joey
Thanks Joey, Will try it. Ryan
